summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the improvement of Greenwood Ave. N. from N. 84th St. to N. 90th St.; and a certain other street, making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund reimbursable from funds to be received under the Federal Aid "M" Program and to the extent permitted by Law from monies to be received from Local Improvement District 6696 authorized and created by Ordinance 107235 for the purpose of paying so much of the cost of the improvement as constitutes a special benefit to the property abutting.
